Platform.Title: Khodursky Lab E. coli B 4290 ORFs Microarray
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: 4290 amplified ORFs from primer pairs (from Sigma Genosys) were printed onto glass slides using a 16 tip robotic printer from 384-well microwell plates
Platform.Description: A microarray with 4405 spot features. Tip Configuration: Standard 16-tip

Column.Name: GENE_SYMBOL
Column.Description: Name of the gene represented by the sequence in the spot/feature

Column.Name: GENE_DESC
Column.Description: Description of the gene represented by the sequence in the spot/feature

Sample.Title: Ecoli_LB growth T1

Channel.Source: Escherichia coli MG1655, Bonner-Vogel OD~0.5
Channel.Characteristics: Escherichia coli MG1655, Bonner-Vogel OD~0.5
Channel.Label: Cy3

Channel.Source: Escherichia coli MG1655, 0 min recovery in LB+0.2% glc
Channel.Characteristics: Escherichia coli MG1655, 0 min recovery in LB+0.2% glc
Channel.Label: Cy5

Sample.Description:
LB growth, WT, 2 min
Recovery from stationary phase of Escherichia coli MG1655 cells in LB+0.2 % glucose vs Bogel-Vonner OD 0.5
Sample.Data-Processing: Normalized log (2) ratio of Cy5/Cy3, normalized using lowess

Series.Title: Recovery from stationary phase in LB + 0.2 % glucose
Series.Summary: Responses of Escherichia coli as they recover from one stationary phase in rich media Keywords: time course
Series.Overall-Design: Escherichia coli cells sampled at several time points (0, 78, 105, 133, 163, 191, 218, 261, 313, 446, 1440 min) as they recover from stationary phase vs Bonner-Vogel medium OD 0.5
